name: graphql-typeorm

scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nodemon -w src -x node lib/index.js

description: This example demonstrate how to use [accounts-js](https://github.com/accounts-js/accounts) with PostgreSQL thanks to the amazing [@accounts/typeorm](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@accounts/typeorm) plugin built by (https://github.com/birkir/)[@birkir]for his awesome project: (https://github.com/birkir/prime)[PrimeCMS].
